definitions.definition: Any of the bony or cartilaginous segments which make up the backbone , consisting in some lower vertebrates of several distinct elements which never become united , and in higher vertebrates having a short more or less cylindrical body whose ends articulate by pads of elastic or cartilaginous tissue with those of adjacent vertebrae and a bony arch that encloses the spinal cord .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) Any of the bony or cartilaginous segments which make up the backbone , consisting in some lower vertebrates of several distinct elements which never become united , and in higher vertebrates having a short more or less cylindrical body whose ends articulate by pads of elastic or cartilaginous tissue with those of adjacent vertebrae and a bony arch that encloses the spinal cord .
